data.description:
THIS APP IS TO BE USED ONLY IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE VRCLINICALS FOR NURSING PRODUCT MADE AVAILABLE BY LAERDAL MEDICAL AS AND WOLTERS KLUWER HEALTH INC. (“WKH”) TO CUSTOMERS AND END USERS THROUGH WKH’S PLATFORM KNOWN AS THEPOINT®. THIS APP IS ONLY INTENDED FOR USE BY USERS REGISTERED ON THEPOINT AS A COMPONENT OF THE VRCLINICALS FOR NURSING PRODUCT AND IS NOT INTENDED FOR ANY OTHER USE OR FOR ANY STANDALONE USE. DO NOT DOWNLOAD OR USE THIS APP IF YOU ARE NOT ALREADY REGISTERED AS A USER OF THE VRCLINICALS FOR NURSING PRODUCT ON THEPOINT (HTTPS://THEPOINT.LWW.COM).

BY DOWNLOADING AND USING THE APP YOU AGREE TO THESE TERMS AND THE ADDITIONAL TERMS STATED IN THE END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT AVAILABLE HERE HTTPS://SSO.WKHPE.COM/TERMSANDCONDITIONS AND THE WKH WEBSITE PRIVACY & COOKIE NOTICE AVAILABLE HERE: HTTPS://THEPOINT.LWW.COM/PRIVACY, COLLECTIVELY KNOWN AS THE “TERMS”. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THE TERMS DO NOT DOWNLOAD OR USE THE APP.

changelog.change_log:
vrClinicals is launched by entering a personal (student) PIN. This PIN is generated on an external platform, and therefore we provide demo-code for testing here.

3AQKX - 1 patient, Round 1
GAK5Y - 1 patient, Round 2
PA3LZ - 1 patient, Round 3

DBN5X - 2 patients, Round 1
LB1UY - 2 patients, Round 2
MBHKZ - 2 patients, Round 3

WCUCX - 3 patients, Round 1
LC1UY - 3 patients, Round 2
4CKLZ - 3 patients, Round 3

KDVZX - 4 patients, Round 1
ADZBY - 4 patients, Round 2
4DOUZ - 4 patients, Round 3
